title: Parents of U.K. Teen Reject White House Meeting With U.S. Diplomat’s Wife Involved in Fatal Accident
text:
WASHINGTON—President Trump is facing blowback from the parents of a British teenager killed in a car accident after Mr. Trump tried to arrange a White House meeting between the parents and the American involved in the accident.

Nineteen-year-old Harry Dunn died in August in central England after his motorcycle collided with a car driven by Anne Sacoolas, the wife of a U.S. diplomat, according to police. Ms. Sacoolas left the U.K. shortly after the accident, setting off an international controversy over whether she should return...
description: President Trump is facing blowback from the parents of a British teenager killed in a car accident after he tried to arrange a White House meeting between the parents and the American involved in the accident.
